description:
cmd/go: do not ignore dependency errors during "go run"

Fixes issue 3490.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

The change to build.go seems to be a matter of taste (I don't immediately see anything going wrong with len(gofiles) = 0 if we continue; nor do I have a case in the other direction). I'll leave it to the Go team.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6139046/diff/2001/src/cmd/go/run.go
File src/cmd/go/run.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6139046/diff/2001/src/cmd/go/run.go#newcode52
src/cmd/go/run.go:52: for _, err := range p.DepsErrors {
This was submitted for review by Robert Hencke in CL 6040046, and accepted into the repo earlier today. Sync your local repo and resubmit.
Given CL 6040046 I don't see the need for this CL.

subject: code review 6139046: cmd/go: do not ignore dependency errors during "go run"
